metadata.description: This super rare, burnable NFT potion updates a Non-Fungible People avatar with spectacular diamond skin. Daz 3D is releasing only 22 diamond skin potions in total, enhancing an NFPâ€™s look and rarity for anyone who updates their avatar. Once burned with the NFP, this upgrade is irreversible.
